1.title: Jaco van der Merwe
1.plot: The "Bittereinder", Jaco van der Merwe, will leave anyone without words with his honest lyrics about culture, language, love and life. Today he is hanging his music and heart on "Die Wasgoedlyn".

1.title: Churchil Naude & Laurinda Hofmeyr
1.plot: We're connecting poet musician Laurinda Hofmeyr from the Paarl and poet rapper Churchil Naude in Mitchells Plain. Music that will get your feet tapping and your heart moving.

2.title: Bacchus Nel & Piet Botha
2.plot: Meet up with two legends in the music business: the mysterious Bacchus Nel and the underground rock hero Piet "Jackhammer" Botha. Get ready for the most beautiful performance by these legends.

3.title: Frazer Barry (Tribal Echo) & Hangklip
3.plot: The rap troubadour Frazer Barry takes us on a Cape adventure, while entertaining us along side Churchil Naude, Riku Lätti, his group Tribal, Piet Botha, Jacques Groenewald en Charles J. Fourie.

4.title: Dozi & Andra
4.plot: The deep voices of Afrikaans music is hanging out on Die Wasgoedlyn. Dozi and Andra open up their souls and give new insight into who they are and what is in their deepest hearts of hearts.

5.title: Andries Bezuidenhout & Liela Groenewald
5.plot: We connect a line between the two talented lecturers, Liela Groenewald en Andries Bezuidenhout. They show how music, art and knowledge is combined in a wonderful combination with Mervin Williams.

6.title: Riku Lätti & Rian Malan
6.plot: Tour through the minds of Riku Lätti and Rian Malan. These two share philosophies which will make your mind wander while moving your heart beyond belief. Music and wisdom beyond compare.

7.title: Loit Sôls, Lochner de Kock & Melville
7.plot: The acclaimed goema-poet and musician Loit Sôls hangs around with the legendary Lochner de Kock. They attract a bundle of artists to join them in night filled with unforgettable music.

8.title: Ryno Velvet, Willim Welsyn, Paarl
8.plot: Ryno Velvet, Willim Welsyn and Jacques Groenewald's humble barbecue evolves into a unique evening Dana Snyman, C. Johan Bakkes, Gert Vlok Nel, Laurinda Hofmeyr, Riku and Jackie Lätti.

9.title: Andre van Rensburg & Les Javan
9.plot: Les Javan, with his soft words and beautiful melodies, and the Chinese-boertjie Andre van Rensburg, member of the former group Battery 9, will expand your horizons on music, sound and words.

10.title: Compilation
10.plot: With all the good performances in this season there are a few songs that never made it to the their own episode. Here we'll show you all those performances.

11.title: Tribute
11.plot: Die Wasgoedlyn is hanging halt-mast as we pay tribute to the lost legends Louis van Rensburg, Christa Steyn, Johannes Kerkorrel en Koos du Plessis.

12.title: Road Trip to the Kousspel
12.plot: Roadtrip from the Cape to Hartebeespoortdam, with unforgettable road trip music and pit-stop performances in Richmond until we reach Die Wasgoedlyn Kousspel final performance at Dozi's Back To The Roots.

13.title: The Kousspel
13.plot:
Know what this is about?
 Be the first one to add a plot.

imdb.plot outline: On the washing line you find everything from work shirts to church blouses, patched socks, vest with holes in it, underwear from Jockey and your girlfriend's petticoats. Next to the washing line sits Les Javan, Rian Malan, Bacchus Nel, the Mitchells Plein Rapper Churchil Naude, the Paarl Rappers, Dozi, Lochner de Kock, Andra Cilliers, Andre van Rensburg, Loit Sols, Riku Latti, Francois van Coke, Willim Welsyn, Ryno Velvet, Laurinda Hofmeyr, Piet Botha, Gert Vlok Nel, a few more Nelle and many more mates. On 'Die Wasgoedlyn' (The Washing Line) we will show you everything that you don't expect to see. We will even show things that might not always be so wise, but it will sound beautiful, that you can believe. 'Die Wasgoedlyn' (The Washing Line) is a cultural-documentary-music show where SAMA Award winning artist Riku Latti visits many musicians and artists, famous and not-so-famous, in their backyards, under their washing lines. Where the drinks are cold and music flows like a mountain stream. Experience some of the great moments like seeing Piet Botha singing at Lanseria airport and almost missing his flight in the process, Liela Groenewald singing in a township near Lenasia, the Mitchells Plain get together that evolves into a magnificent exchange of cultural elements, Andra at her home between all the hats and fabrics, Gert Vlok Nel, sober, Andre van Rensburg the Chinese-boertjie on a roof in the middle of Hillbrow, Ryno Velvet and Willim Welsyn together with Dana Snyman, Laurinda Hofmeyr and C. Johan Bakkes in a barn in Paarl, Dozi on his farm, and and and....
imdb.title: Die Wasgoedlyn
plot: Afrikaans musicians telling and singing their stories in their natural habitat: at their homes, with friends and subsequently sharing and growing the language in many facets.::_Die Wasgoedlyn_ (qv)
